v.v: God is the one who protects us and causes us to be strong;
So, even if the earth shakes,
and if the water in the sea roars and foams,
Blessings that come from God are like a river that makes everyone in the city joyful, there where we worship him.
God is in this city, and it will never be destroyed;
Sometimes the people of many nations are terrified;
But Yahweh, commander of the angel armies, is with us;
Come and see the things that Yahweh does!
He stops wars all over the world;
God says, “Be quiet and remember that I am God!
So never forget that Yahweh, commander of the angel armies, is with us;

v: he is always ready to help us when we have troubles.
Even if the mountains fall into the middle of the sea,
and if the hills shake violently,
It is the city where the temple of God, who is greater than any other god, exists.
he will come to help the people in that city at dawn every day.
the God whom Jacob worshiped is our refuge.
Come and see the things he has destroyed all over the earth.
People of all nations will honor me.
People all over the earth will honor me.”
the God whom Jacob worshiped is our refuge.
